parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Lights

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Gets provided object's lighting information.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getLightingAt]] obj

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] to format [ambientLightColor, ambientLightBrightness, dynamicLightColor, dynamicLightBrightness]:
* ambientLightColor: [[Color|Color RGB]]
* ambientLightBrightness: [[Number]]
* dynamicLightColor: [[Color|Color (RGB)]]
* dynamiclightBrightness: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value><code>[[getLightingAt]] [[player]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[1,1,1], 0.5, [0,0,0], 0]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getLighting]] [[Lightpoint Tutorial]]
</value></part></template></root>
